A4.description: It is said that this bow belongs to Skorm the one who reigns in the shadows. A legend says that the bow appears in this realm everytime a mass catastroph happens.

D1.name: Leather armor
D1.description: With this armor you can easily move around, but it doesnt do a really good job at keeping you alive though.

D2.name: Elven armor
D2.description: This armor is forged with Elven magic wich makes the metal really light. It will let you move freely while also protecting you a bit.

D3.name: Rexxar's armor
D3.description: This armor once belonged to the Rexxar, a famous hunter. He retired and sold it on ebay.

D4.name: Thanatos armor
D4.description: This armor is full of darkness and evil powers. It is said that it once belonged to Thanatos himself.
